institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 33 (Selection of Training Support Center)
contents: Article 33 (Selection of Training Support Center) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall form an independent committee of about 3 to 5 experts to conduct screening and deliberation for the selection of institutions. ② The Screening and Deliberation Committee shall select institutions based on the proposal documents for each institution. Competency, business plan, budget plan, etc. are reviewed, and if necessary, additional interview screening and on-site screening can be conducted. ③ If there is no suitable organization as a result of the screening and deliberation committee's review, re-announcement can be made only once. If there is no suitable institution even after re-announcement, the project can be carried out by additionally allocating the project quantity and budget to the already selected institution.
